thread.title: Movie promises to create wealth & abundance - The Treasure Map
thread.title_full: Movie promises to create wealth & abundance - The Treasure Map

author: Stan Romero
title: Movie promises to create wealth & abundance - The Treasure Map
text:
The Treasure Map is a brand new Law of Attraction movie featuring several speakers from the Hit film The Secret and many other top thinkers on wealth. 1
Wealth and abundance are results that come from following a predictable pattern. This pattern is only known to less than 1% of the world's population. Yet once discovered this pattern creates for the user a flowing stream of wealth and continual abundance!
Abundance and wealth flow to those prepared to take specific actions. This film reveals those steps for the first time ever. Wealth and abundance are within your reach.
If you enjoyed film like The Secret, The Opus or The Gratitude Experiment you are in for a treat. Douglas Vermeeren, the Creator of The Opus and Gratitude Experiment is about to release his latest film The Treasure Map.
This film, featuring experts from The Secret and other well-known personal development thought leaders will tackle the question of wealth and abundance. While the film will have some important law of attraction lessons on the concept of abundance this film promises to deliver many practical strategies on how to actually make money. “Wealth and Abundance begins with mindset yet requires correct strategy and activities to generate results,” Says Vermeeren the films creator, “And this film is calculated to share those strategies that only the wealthy know and understand.” Raymond Aaron, one of the films leading stars explained, “The rich do what’s often difficult so they can live easy. But the poor and broke do what’s easy and as a result their lives are hard.”
Randy Gage, also a star of the film answered the question of who this film is built for and who can expect results from it. “Anybody can create prosperity and theres never been a better opportunity than right now.” “Now is the time and this is vehicle,” Confirmed the world’s greatest hypnotist Marshall Sylver who rounds out the cast.
Some of the other notable members include experts who have made their fortune in real estate, investing, business and even capitalizing on their own intellectual property.
This film stars such notable experts as Dr. John Demartini, Loral Langemeier, Raymond Aaron, Marshall Sylver, Randy Gage, Stefan Aarnio, Darren Jacklin and Douglas Vermeeren. You can find out more by going to http://www.TheTreasureMapMovie.com
